section.p: The active problem section shall contain a narrative description of the conditions currently being monitored for the patient. It shall include entries for patient conditions as described in the Entry Content Module.

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Problem Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.11)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Concern Entry (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2)
SHALL conform to CCD Problem Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.11)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11450-4" Problem list (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-141, CONF-142)

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF-140), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Concern Entry (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.5.2)

SHOULD contain a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'problems'. (CONF-144)
[OCL]: self.title = 'problems'
